label: dog
caption: A fluffy grey dog, its fur ruffled by the wind, leaps exuberantly towards a playful black and white canine companion in the midst of a winter wonderland. The snow-covered terrain glistens under the pale sunlight as the dogs frolic together, their joyful energy infectious. With a carefree bark, the grey dog lands a playful tackle on its opponent, sending them both tumbling into a gentle drift.
